content.text: A rewrite of the Ra Material (The Law of One) in narrative book format. The original material, received by Don Elkins, Carla L. Rueckert, and Jim McCarty between 1981 and 1984, is in question-and-answer format. This project transforms it into continuous prose for easier reading.

This project was created with assistance from Claude by Anthropic. While every effort has been made to maintain accuracy and fidelity to the original material, AI-generated content may contain inaccuracies, inconsistencies, or misinterpretations.
This work should be used as a supplementary study tool only. For authoritative understanding, always refer to the original Ra Material at llresearch.org.
This project is open source. The complete code, writing system, and pipeline are available on GitHub.

You are welcome to fork the repository and create your own version of this book â€” or an entirely new one. The writing system is designed to be reproducible: it includes protocols, prompts, and automation tools that can be adapted to other source material.

As AI agents become more capable, this kind of project will become easier to create and improve. We hope this serves as a starting point for others who want to make philosophical or spiritual texts more accessible.
